name: The Escape (itch) (Alixxir)
description:
You've been trapped inside an ancient tomb and the sun is setting. Solve the puzzles to escape the tomb, then sail off into the sunset!

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Right Click (Hold) - Pickup highlighted object

Version 1.01:
Added the long-lost soundtrack and an escape method for intrepid river explorers in the first room :)
